text:
="preserve">Pierre Bernard (6 June 1934 – 5 December 2020) was a French politician. He was born in Alban, France. He was a member of the Socialist Party. He was Mayor of Trébas from 1970 to 2001. From 1980 to 1993, he was a member of the National Assembly.
Bernard died on 5 December 2020 in Trébas at the age of 86.
